title: Is it correct to say “check about something”? - Quora

response.answer_text: No it is not correct. You would not use about with check. It is best to use. Let me check into it.Let me check it out.Let me check.I am checking.Hope this helps!
No. In most cases I would offer a correction. In this case I don’t understand what message the original fragment was trying to convey.
